scripts.akkaslslocalstart: docker run -d --name acmesunglasses-users -p 8080:8080 ${DOCKER_USER:-retgits}/acmesunglasses-users:$npm_package_version && docker run -d --name proxy -p 9000:9000 --env USER_FUNCTION_HOST=${CURRENT_IP:-host.docker.internal} cloudstateio/cloudstate-proxy-dev-mode:latest
scripts.akkaslslocalstop: docker stop acmesunglasses-users && docker rm acmesunglasses-users && docker stop proxy && docker rm proxy
